Parameters: int: at which sensor events are processed (see also @B_android#hardware#SensorManager_E@). Use the default value of @B_android#hardware#SensorManager#SENSOR_DELAY_NORMAL_E@ for simple screen orientation change detection.
int: The new orientation of the device.
onOrientationChanged(int).Description: Called when the orientation of the device has changed. orientation parameter is in degrees, ranging from 0 to 359. orientation is 0 degrees when the device is oriented in its natural position, 90 degrees when its left side is at the top, 180 degrees when it is upside down, and 270 degrees when its right side is to the top. @B_android#view#OrientationEventListener#ORIENTATION_UNKNOWN_E@ is returned when the device is close to flat and the orientation cannot be determined.

enable().Description: Enables the OrientationEventListener so it will monitor the sensor and call @B_android#view#OrientationEventListener#onOrientationChanged_E@ when the device orientation changes.

ClassDesc: Helper class for receiving notifications from the SensorManager when the orientation of the device has changed.
